sentence.Network_en: The entire metropolitan center possessed a high and mighty air calculated to overawe and abash the common applicant.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个市中心区有着一种高傲的神气,好像故意要让一些前来寻找职业的普通人感到惶恐不安.

sentence.Network_en: That could abash the little bird That kept so many warm.
sentence.Network_cn: 能够使得小鸟不安保有此多暖意.

sentence.Network_en: That could abash the little bird.
sentence.Network_cn: 能使小巧的鸟儿备受伤害.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... abase ? v. 贬低降低地位、威望或尊严 abash ? vt. 使不安，使羞愧 abate ? v. 减轻，减低.
以a开头的英语单词有哪些_百度知道 ... abase 贬抑；降低 abash 使局促不安 abate 减少；减轻.
英语谐音背单词_百度知道 ... efficiency  a. 有效的，生效的 abash   vt. 使...羞愧,使困窘 athlete  n. 运动员.
【最新】GRE单词(红宝书)TXT完全版 - 豆丁网 ... abandon v./n. 放弃；放纵 abash v. 使害羞，使尴尬 abate v. 减轻，减少.

list.abs: felt abashed at the extravagant praise ;, 对过分的表扬感到脸红;
I listened to this word to feel be ashamed already comfort again , I also had had this kind of panic-stricken feel abashed show .我听了这话感到既惭愧又安慰，我也有过这种惊慌失措的羞人表现。
take the stand [美]出庭作证; 为...担保witness stand 证人席stand abashed 感到羞愧, 感到拘促不安stand against 抵抗, 反抗; 靠在...上; 经受住.
I stood abashed at his rebuke ., 面对他的斥责我感到无地自容.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Anglo-Norman French abaiss-; compare with Old French esbaiss-, lengthened stem of esbair, from es- 'utterly' + bair 'astound'

encyclopedia.content: 读音 语法标注解释 abash英音：[ə'bæʃ]美音：[ə'bæʃ] 词性 动词（及物动词vt）中文翻译 1. 使不安；使羞愧；使窘迫 When the child saw all the room filled with strangers, he was much abashed. 那小孩一看到满屋子都是陌生人，感到非常局促不安。

means.word_mean: 1. cause to be embarrassed; cause to feel self-conscious
使羞愧, 使局促, 使窘迫

sentences.en: The girl was abashed by the laughter of her classmates.
sentences.cn: 那小姑娘因同学的哄笑而局促不安。

sentences.en: He glanced at Juliet accusingly and she looked suitably abashed.
sentences.cn: 他怪罪的一瞥，朱丽叶自然显得很窘。
